alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 7:42PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A quick burst of snow showers and blowing snow will continue to move across Interstate 80 and other highways... An area of snow showers moving to the southeast will continue to affect the Winnemucca area as well as portions of Us 95 from Paradise Valley south and I-80 from Winnemucca Airport east to Battle Mountain for the next 30 minutes to one hour. Visibilities of one-half to one mile will be possible along with gusts to 20 to 30 mph. This can drop a quick half inch to inch of snow along southern Humboldt and northern Lander county. Travelers driving across US 95 or I-80 are urged to use caution, reduce speed, and use low beams. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

area.areaDesc: Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County
